semantic_description: RabbitMQ message publishing and consuming within the CLM-Web service are not currently represented in Jaeger traces.

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.destination
attributes_to_add.value_source: the variable holding the queue or exchange name (e.g., 'exchangeName' or 'queueName')

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.destination_kind
attributes_to_add.value_source: the literal string 'queue' or 'exchange', chosen based on whether publishing to a queue or exchange

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: the literal string 'publish' for producers or 'consume' for consumers

attributes_to_add.name: rabbitmq.routing_key
attributes_to_add.value_source: the variable 'routingKey' passed to BasicPublish / consumer callback
